Licensed Drivers Data

Source: R/data.R
drivers.Rd

A dataset of licensed drivers data scraped from the Brazilian Ministry of Transport.

Usage

drivers

Format

A tibble with 114,492 rows and 7 variables:

regiao

Brazilian Geographic Region

uf

Federative Unit - Brazilian States Acronym

sexo

Drivers sex

faixa_etaria

Drivers age group

ano

Year

categoria_cnh

Drivers license category

condutores

Amount of drivers

Source

https://www.gov.br/transportes/pt-br/assuntos/transito/conteudo-Senatran/estatisticas-quantidade-de-habilitados-denatran
